overview.en: The vision of OFT (Oftoken) is to build a global decentralized economic and ecological system. In the future, we will use block chain technology to practice the licensing economic model in traditional industries, single product explosions, big data, offline stores and other vertical entities, issuance of digital integrals, exchange currency, transaction mining, dividend distribution, community incentives and other links. OFT will be regarded as OFEX traffic. The basic circulation, mortgage and consumption tokens of the easy platform exist.
overview.zh: OFT（Oftoken）的愿景是构建全球范围内去中心化的通证经济生态体系，未来我们将运用区块链技术，将在传统行业、单品爆款，大数据、线下门店等各垂直实体领域践行通证经济模式，数字积分发行，交易所上币、交易挖矿、分红、社区激励等环节，OFT将作为OFEX交易平台的基础流通、抵押及消费代币而存在。
